custom-sql.sql: SELECT {CTEntryAggregate.*} FROM CTEntryAggregate INNER JOIN CTCollection_CTEntryAggregate ON CTCollection_CTEntryAggregate.ctEntryAggregateId = CTEntryAggregate.ctEntryAggregateId WHERE (CTCollection_CTEntryAggregate.ctCollectionId = ?) AND (CTEntryAggregate.ownerCTEntryId = ?)

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM CTEntry INNER JOIN CTEntryAggregate ON CTEntryAggregate.ownerCTEntryId = CTEntry.ctEntryId INNER JOIN CTEntryAggregates_CTEntries ON CTEntryAggregates_CTEntries.ctEntryAggregateId = CTEntryAggregate.ctEntryAggregateId WHERE CTEntryAggregates_CTEntries.ctEntryId = ?
SELECT {CTEntry.*} FROM CTEntry INNER JOIN CTCollections_CTEntries ON CTCollections_CTEntries.ctEntryId = CTEntry.ctEntryId WHERE CTCollections_CTEntries.ctCollectionId = ?

SELECT {CTEntry.*} FROM CTEntry INNER JOIN CTEntryAggregate ON CTEntryAggregate.ownerCTEntryId = CTEntry.ctEntryId INNER JOIN CTEntryAggregates_CTEntries ON CTEntryAggregates_CTEntries.ctEntryAggregateId = CTEntryAggregate.ctEntryAggregateId WHERE CTEntryAggregates_CTEntries.ctEntryId = ?

SELECT {CTProcess.*} FROM CTProcess INNER JOIN CTCollection ON CTProcess.ctCollectionId = CTCollection.ctCollectionId INNER JOIN BackgroundTask ON CTProcess.backgroundTaskId = BackgroundTask.backgroundTaskId WHERE (CTProcess.companyId = ?) AND (BackgroundTask.status = ?) ORDER BY CTProcess.createDate DESC
